title: I am going to keep posting here until people actually take note, this season has gone down hill
body:
3v5 ranked game and I get this. Seriously, a 3v5 ranked game and one of my team who is a regular Platinum Korea server player (well that is what he said) could not believe he was actually seeing players AFK in a ranked game. That was the guy chatting on screen.

3-4 minutes in, no one playing badly, our jungle goes AFK, than about 10-15 minutes in our ADC goes AFK. Players give dont give 2 shits about ranked anymore, I get no issues with normals, ARAM, TT or anything else, but get all the players in ranked go and ruin the game.

replies.body:
Unfortunately you can't do much to change the outcome of that 3v5. What is under your control though is how much that game tilts you. I'd just accept it as an unwinnable game.

You seem to be winning more than losing,  so I wouldn't worry about it.
And here i was thinking you were complaining about the failed surrender with a 2/0 vote.
Yeah yeah yeah this always happens it's not like any of us are gonna start a revolution anytime soon just get in line.

i actually played a ranked game were it was a 2v5(i was on the 5 man team) dues to a premade with club tags all dcing at the same time. it was fucking sad and it was even sadder when a person on our team got salty because they got killed twice by their yasuo and when we started rolling to inhibs they start shit talking the enemy yas and xin, then saying shit like "get rekt" or "gg ez" when the game ended.

last night i played a normal were i was on a 3v5 team 10 minutes in a duo dced after a failed bot gank with top tping in. the game lasted 43 minutes.

I wonder why they are playing ranked instead of just normals if they dont give a fuck?

Only difference is the queue

TBH, i didnt start playing ranked till this season because i hated the old draft pick, and blind you arent guaranteed a role you want, its first call who gets it. This could be the issue, players are flocking to the better queue just for more convenience, including players that dont give a hoot about ranked. implementing the same queue for normals could help?
